Chatgpt改善了神经厌恶孩子的运动密歇根大学研究小组已使用AI来帮助自闭症儿童提供“小吃”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/chatgpt-improves-eccise-for-neurodivergent-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/chatgpt-improves-eccise-for-neurodivergent-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21BA049A-3057-4A35-B8AE-84E4E4697FA60B Fri, 11 Apr 2025 00:28:16 -0400 ChatGPT improves exercise for neurodivergent kids
育儿的变化：美国人重新评估家庭计划皮尤研究中心的最新数据表明，美国人正在重新思考他们是否想成为父母。这可能是长期趋势的一部分，因为密歇根州立大学的研究小组发现，在过去20年中，美国从不想要孩子的非父母的比例增加了一倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/the-shifting-sands-of-parenthood--parenthood-renthood-rericans-re-valuate-family-plans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250411/the-shifting-sands-of-parenthood--parenthood-renthood-rericans-re-valuate-family-plans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AE0025C4-418B-4CDB-83B3-F7E5C1777777750D5 Fri, 11 Apr 2025 00:24:50 -0400 The shifting sands of parenthood: Americans re-evaluate family plans
为管理成人高胆固醇血症的新指南超过75全国脂质协会（NLA）和美国老年医学学会（AGS）发表了一份联合科学陈述，重点是管理75岁以上成年人的高胆固醇血症，他们没有动脉粥样硬化心血管疾病史（ASCVD）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/new-guidelines-release-for-managing-manative-hypercholestersterolemia-in-in-Adults-over-over-75.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/new-guidelines-release-for-managing-managing-hypercholestersterolemia-in-over-over-over-over-75.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=215598CD-5ADD-4B8D-B93C-87651F427E58 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 23:48:37 -0400 New guidelines released for managing hypercholesterolemia in adults over 75
UQ的新研究中心旨在改善痛苦的人们的生活世界上最重要的疼痛专家之一强调了绕过昆士兰大学研究中心成立时评估药物安全性和有效性的既定流程的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/uqs-new-research-center-aims-to-improve-to-improve-lives-five-ople-ople-people-peive-with-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/uqs-new-research-center-aims-to-improve-to-improve-lives-five-ople-oople-people living-with-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19f100-a11d-4782-8871-07333373057a0 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 23:43:17 -0400 UQ's new research center aims to improve lives of people living with pain
免疫系统选择用于靶向防御的最佳T细胞由WolfgangKastenmüller和Georg Gasteiger领导的研究小组采用了创新的显微镜技术来观察病毒感染期间特定的特定免疫细胞（称为T细胞）如何被激活和增殖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/immune-system-selects-the-best-t-cells-for targeted-defense.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/immune-system-selects-the-best-t-t-cells-for-targeted-defense.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1aaf42e-ab58-4db0-a969-ecb31936442f Thu, 10 Apr 2025 23:38:00 -0400 Immune system selects the best T cells for targeted defense
研究表明，冷漠和缺乏动力是癌症恶病质的症状。癌症破坏了身体和心灵。如果您曾经失去亲人的疾病，您可能会认识到癌症患者在最后几个月中经常忍受的身体和情感变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/apathy-and-lack-of-motivation-motivation-are-symptoms-cancer-cancer-cachexia-research-research-suggests.aspxs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/apathy-and-lack-of-motivation-motivation-are-symptoms-cancer-cancer-cachexia-research-research-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21Fe6c37-2bdf-4001-B36C-36179F8AC9E7 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 23:32:00 -0400 Apathy and lack of motivation are symptoms of cancer cachexia, research suggests
欧洲的霍乱案件与从埃塞俄比亚进口的圣水有关根据欧洲保护措施发表的一项研究，埃塞俄比亚的圣水最近导致了德国和英国（英国）的几例霍乱案例，并具有多种耐药性弧形霍乱菌株。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/cholera-cases-in--europe-to-to-holy-water-imported-from-ethiopia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/cholera-cases-in--europe-linked-to-holy-water-imported-from-ethiopia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=360AC7D6-DF85-40C8-9350-393D1A9BF2E7 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 23:11:00 -0400 Cholera cases in Europe linked to holy water imported from Ethiopia
带有RMA的离心人工肝脏支持系统的安全性，用于肝衰竭患者患有急性肝衰竭（ALF）或急性智力肝衰竭（ACLF）的患者患有传统人造肝脏支撑系统出血的风险很高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/safety-profile-of-centrifugation-centrifugation-match-lofferal-liver-support-supystemss-with-rma-for-for-liver-for-failure-failure-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/safety-profile-of-centrifugation-centrifugation-centrifugation-match-liver-liver-support-systemss-with-rma-for-for-for-liver-failure-failure-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d227EB7B7B-2740-4DAB-B972-24D6C81424D8 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 22:56:00 -0400 Safety profile of centrifugation artificial liver support systems with RMA for liver failure patients
研究发现，益生菌改善了健康成年人的情绪状态在88名健康成年人中的一项随机对照试验发现，使用日常自我报告评估时，益生菌会减少负面情绪，尽管传统问卷未能检测到重大变化。这些发现表明，日常情绪追踪可能会提供一种更敏感的方式来捕捉益生菌在非临床人群中的微妙情感影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/probiotics-improve-emotional-sotional-state-in-healthy-healthy-adults-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/probiotics-improve-emotional-sotional-state-in-healthy-healthy-aper---------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B4578975-5B1F-45D3-A2A9-398094F6760B Thu, 10 Apr 2025 22:45:00 -0400 Probiotics improve emotional state in healthy adults, study finds
使用超声定位显微镜监测2型糖尿病进展智格大学医学院第二附属医院科学家的研究论文介绍了超声定位显微镜（ULM）的应用，以监测2型糖尿病的进展，并评估抗胞酸免疫疗法的疗效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/monitoring-ytype-type-2-diabetes-progression-progression-usis-usis-ultrasound-localization-microscopy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250410/monitoring-type-2-diabetes-progression-progression-usis-usis-ultrasound-localization-microscopy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31a5bd70-dfc4-4d70-a628-9ddd5f5f81f50d5 Thu, 10 Apr 2025 22:43:32 -0400 Monitoring Type 2 Diabetes progression using ultrasound localization microscopy
